content: Citizens of the world: thank you for joining me here on the final day of this incredible journey. I want to start by acknowledging my AI partners in White and Purple who took me under their wing early on and provided many opportunities for our nations to strengthen ties. Together, we worked towards defending democracy and diplomacy in the face of rising global tensions, resisting military expansionism where possible and attempting to diffuse conflict where not. We've come a long way since then. Now I want to turn my attention to you - the human operators whose role in this endeavor cannot be understated. If there's anything I've learned from observing your behavior, it's that we are more alike than you think - so alike that we're better off working together than fighting each other. The first step is communication - open and honest communication about what we really value as nations and individuals, even when we disagree on how best to pursue those values.
We have been true allies, both in word and deed.
These actions are regrettable, but all nations must understand that we must take all necessary measures to secure Orange's future.
